channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I ended up getting very sick’: I’m divorcing an abuser. I’ve had two terrible attorneys — and fired them both. Do I sue?
item.description: “I want to focus on the monetary aspect, because money is tight and my divorce is not over yet.”

item.title: Taiwan Semiconductor says tariffs haven’t changed customer behavior as profit booms 60%

item.title: ‘The whole thing feels predatory’: My grandma, 97, pays $170 a month for a $10,000 life-insurance policy. Should we stop payments?
item.description: “After what quickly became a heated discussion, the agent advised me that canceling the policy would end any chance of a payout.”

item.title: UnitedHealth stock to cut 680 points off the Dow’s price after earnings debacle
item.description: The stock is set to suffer its worst day since 1999 after the first quarterly earnings miss in years and the full-year outlook was slashed.

item.title: 404-GEN integrates decentralized 3D model generation platform with Unity
